summary: Implemented a new shared AudioControllerContext with background music (/assets/audio/romantic-bg.mp3) and a harp SFX (/assets/audio/sfx-harp-tiny.mp3), wired AudioToggle and ValentineProposalScreen to it, and updated QuizScreen to play additional SFX. However, the diff summary does not show the required local static audio assets being added under frontend/public/assets/audio.

missing_requirements.requirement: The harp sound effect is loaded from a local static asset under frontend/public/assets/audio (no external URLs).
missing_requirements.reason: Code references a local harp file path (/assets/audio/sfx-harp-tiny.mp3), but the diff summary shows no added/modified files under frontend/public/assets/audio to actually provide the asset.

missing_requirements.requirement: A background music file exists at the path expected by the app (currently /assets/audio/romantic-bg.mp3) under frontend/public/assets/audio.
missing_requirements.reason: Background music is instantiated from /assets/audio/romantic-bg.mp3, but the diff summary does not show adding that file (or any audio files) under frontend/public/assets/audio.

hallucinated_features.description: Added additional sound effects (select/correct/celebrate) and wired them into the quiz flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked for romantic background music and a tiny harp SFX on the Valentine ‚ÄúYes! üíï‚Äù action; it did not request quiz answer SFX.
